action.action-desc: Mrs. Sykes (for herself and Mr. Carey) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To criminalize stalking using an unauthorized geotracking device.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Electronic Stalking Act of 2025.
Section 2261A of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking Whoever and inserting (a) In general.—Whoever;
by inserting after uses the mail, the following: uses an unauthorized geotracking device; and
by adding at the end the following:
The term geotracking device means an electronic or mechanical device that permits a person to remotely determine or track the position and movement of another person.
The term unauthorized means, with respect to a geotracking device, that the person on whom the geotracking device is being used has not consented to such use or otherwise revoked consent to such use.
